name: NPS_Reinforced_Fan-back_Polyfold_Chairs_(Pack_of_4)
reviews: got tired of borrowing chairs for large family functions. these are light weight, comfortable. they are fairly wide, however, so take up quite a bit of room and long table. I'm not sure they're any wider than most folding chairs, however. They're not quite as ugly as some folding chairs.
Not what I thought or to different colors and look to cheap
Great..packing. .. delivery awesome. .just on time... The chairs. So pretty.. i will buy more.. soon.. thank you.. I recommendthis chairs to everyone. ..
I bought these chairs for a reception in my home for my daughter's wedding. Very nice chairs!
description:
A comfortable design and a fan back make this polyfold folding chair unique. This folding chair is perfect for indoor and outdoor spaces.
Color options: Blue, rose, black, whiteHigh-radius fan back provides added ergonomic comfort and breathabilityPolypropylene plastic seat and backContoured for stacking up to 80 inches high (26 chairs)Plastic will not fade or rustFeatures a powder-coated steel frame for added strengthReinforced with 0.875-inch round tubingTwo U-shaped cross bracesThree rivets on either sideDouble hingesSet includes four (4) chairsEach chair measures 34.5 inches high x 18.5 inches wide x 20.75 inches deepMaterialStainless SteelSet SizeSet of 4ColorBlack, Blue, Pink, WhiteFurniture PatternSolid
